mapper.select: select count(a.uid) cnt from ( select nco.uid , nco.biz_name , nc.r_uid from netfu_concern nc, netfu_item_company nic, netfu_company nco where 1=1 and nc.uid = #{loginId} and nc.type = 'job' and nc.sub_type = 'company' and nc.r_uid = nco.uid and nc.r_uid = nic.uid group by nc.uid, nco.biz_name, nc.r_uid ) a

select nc.uid , nco.biz_name , nc.r_uid , sum(if((nic.biz_ing <> 'yes' and nic.biz_end_day >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()), 1, 0)) biz_ing_cnt , sum(if((nic.biz_ing = 'yes' or nic.biz_end_day < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()), 1, 0)) biz_not_ing_cnt from netfu_concern nc, netfu_item_company nic, netfu_company nco where 1=1 and nc.uid = #{loginId} and nc.type = 'job' and nc.sub_type = 'company' and nc.r_uid = nco.uid and nc.r_uid = nic.uid group by nc.uid, nco.biz_name, nc.r_uid

select count(nc.no_to) from netfu_concern nc, netfu_item_company nic where 1=1 and nc.uid = #{loginId} and nic.uid = #{companyUid} and nc.type = 'job' and nc.sub_type = 'company'
and nic.biz_ing <> 'yes'
and ((nic.biz_end_type ='input' and nic.biz_end_day >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) or nic.biz_end_type ='get' or nic.biz_end_type ='often') and nc.r_uid = nic.uid

select ${recruitColumn} from netfu_concern nc, netfu_item_company nic where 1=1 and nc.uid = #{loginId} and nic.uid = #{companyUid} and nc.type = 'job' and nc.sub_type = 'company'
and nic.biz_ing <> 'yes'
and ((nic.biz_end_type ='input' and nic.biz_end_day >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) or nic.biz_end_type ='get' or nic.biz_end_type ='often') and nc.r_uid = nic.uid
mapper.delete: delete from netfu_concern where 1=1 and uid = #{loginId} and FIND_IN_SET(r_uid, #{deleteItemMulti})
